headline: Show HN: 10letters – A Free Daily Word Puzzle Game with a Twist of Hangman
description:
Hey HN! We are first-time indie game developers and we just launched a Free Daily Word Puzzle Game called 10letters with a unique twist of hangman.

Play the game here: https://10letters.app (Web-based, Available on all platforms, no sign-ups)

- The game is free and does not require any sign-ups.

- The objective of the game is to guess a secret 5-letter word from 10 alphabets. You need to guess only 1 secret word to win the game.

- Score more points by guessing as many secret words before you run out of lives. Each daily win counts towards your streak.

We are excited for you to try our game and we will appreciate any feedback. If you do enjoy the game, please also feel free to share your game stats.

Thank you!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 10letters - 一个免费的每日单词谜题游戏，带有刽子手的味道。
